get.description:
Get the permission level for a given (client, email) pair.
It requires either a valid API key provided as header or to be signed in as super-admin

401.description: Request session not found or invalid

403.description: Required permission not provided for resource

404.description: Provided (clientId, email) Not Found

post.description:
Sets the permission level for a given (client, user) pair.
It requires either a valid API key provided as header or to be signed in as super-admin
You can select one of the available levels: explorer, creator, analyst, super-admin

requestBody.description: Permission level assigned to the account

delete.description:
Removes the permission level for a given (client, user-email) pair therefore removing access to that client.
It requires either a valid API key provided as header or to be signed in as super-admin

post.summary: Set a permission level for multiple accounts
post.description:
Sets the permission level for a given list of accounts for the given client ID.
It requires either a valid API key provided as header or to be signed in as super-admin
You can select one of the available levels: explorer, creator, analyst, super-admin

put.summary: Changes whether a client is enabled or not

Sets the enabled status for the provided client.
This doesn't delete the client, but it will make it inaccessible.
It requires either a valid API key provided as header or to be signed in as super-admin
